original_text: I saw in the night visions, and, behold, one like the Son of man came with the clouds of heaven, and came to the Ancient of days, and they brought him near before him.
korean_text: 내가 또 밤 환상 중에 보니 인자 같은 이가 하늘 구름을 타고 와서 옛적부터 항상 계신 이에게 나아가 그 앞으로 인도되매

sentences.original_text: I saw in the night visions
one like the Son of man
came with the clouds of heaven
and came to the Ancient of days
and they brought him near before him
